About Me

Let me tell you a bit about myself and what I do...

I like to build cool stuff.


Hello there! My name is Brandon Evans and I'm a full-stack developer from Austin, TX. I have a serious passion for web app development with a background in cybersecurity.


I have a diverse set of skills in both front-end as well as back-end technologies and believe in developing solutions that help others.
